message.body: So I'm in fairfax (with my dude who I don't think you met yet) til tomorrow. Wanna hang tonight maybe? Do you know if Melissa's around?
Just leaving work now, where were you thinking? Will txt melissa. She lives up in rockville now so don't know if she'll be up for coming down.
Not sure! Running a race in the morning, so can't party too hard. Any suggestions?
Didn't hear back from melissa. NoVa not my turf but can either drive or metro. Somewhere not near tysons or other malls if drive?
What, you don't want to get some sweet deals?? What about one of the dogfish heads? Falls church, fairfax, Gaithersburg?
Ok none of those seem all that convenient for you...open to suggestion!
Can't think of anything better. Dfh fairfax at 830-845?
Sold! Thank you for journeying into the deep suburbs.
